Rules.InvariantScript: LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'

If(_VarActivetopTabID= ThisItem.TabId, ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Button Fill").'Default Value' ), ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Primary Color").'Default Value' ))

If(_VarActivetopTabID= ThisItem.TabId, ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Button  Fill").'Default Value') , ColorValue(LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Button Hover Color").'Default Value'))
